entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:57 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
